summary: This document is an email exchange between two individuals discussing a draft status memo regarding Jeffrey Epstein (JE), likely for the Office of the Deputy Attorney General (ODAG). The email includes a redlined attachment of the memo and indicates the memo contains legal analysis.
keyFacts: A status memo regarding Jeffrey Epstein (JE) was being drafted for the Office of the Deputy Attorney General (ODAG) as of March 2019.
The memo draft was noted to be 'a little on the long side' due to legal analysis, but a length of about three pages was considered acceptable.
The email exchange suggests ongoing internal DOJ review or communication about the Epstein case in early 2019.
